alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:13AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron, western Jefferson Davis and eastern Calcasieu Parishes through 445 AM CDT... At 412 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebleu Settlement, or near Moss Bluff, moving south at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Cameron, Iowa, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Moss Bluff, Buller, Hacketts Corner, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Creole, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown and Holmwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 29 and 45. Interstate 210 between mile markers 5 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
